title: It Pays to Watch!
overview: It Pays to Watch! is a money saving show presented by money saving expert Martin Lewis, co-presented by Ruth Liptrot. The show aims to help save and make consumers money. Money saving tips have ranged from claiming back old bank charges, something Lewis has campaigned for, to completing surveys on the internet to make some extra cash. Lewis often states he wants consumers to take revenge on corporations to claim back money rightfully theirs.
